description: This table contains information about the forms associated to this customer service communication.

columns.name: COMM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the communication record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CRM_FORMS_LIST_FORM_ID
columns.description: Holds both filed and unfiled forms attached to the communication.

columns.name: CRM_FORMS_LIST_FORM_ID_FORM_NAME
columns.description: The name of the form associated with the questionnaire.

columns.name: CRM_FORMS_FILED_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the form is filed or not.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes
